title: Representative Learning Design (RLD)-Based Amateur Women’s Cricket Player Skill Development Training Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic cricket rules and pedagogical methodology comprehension
context.additional_context: A course where pre-service teachers learn RLD techniques applicable to actual cricket coaching scenarios.

learning_goals: Learners design cricket skill training programs by applying RLD (Reinforcement Learning Dynamics) principles
Learners construct training environments simulating real-game scenarios to enhance athletes' cognitive and technical development
Learners can develop and evaluate differentiated RLD (Rehearsal and Learning Design) training sessions based on specific batting and pitching skills.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
